title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST & CLI API that lets you pull, create, and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for the Ollama API; install via pip, sync & async support, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers, provides chat, generate, pull, create, etc.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; open-source local AI interface with plugin ecosystem, voice input, multimodal support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity, PVC, and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose templates for Ollama + CUDA, Open-WebUI, Chroma, Weaviate, and other vector stores.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, and advanced patterns.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline module that spins up Ollama inside a container to run model tests in CI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and DI extensions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for local AI note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.
